mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.cart_cnt, c.customer_id, p.item_no, p.item_name, p.item_img, p.sales_p, (c.cart_cnt * p.sales_p) AS total_price FROM cart c INNER JOIN product p ON c.item_no = p.item_no INNER JOIN customer cu ON c.customer_id = cu.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY c.cart_no DESC
